description: The Solitude Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Solitude Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Solitude Mountain for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Solitude Mountain icon
name: Snow Report for Solitude Mountain
shortDescription: The Solitude Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Solitude Mountain.
